body:
Use the vwright program, which outputs the view computation vectors in 
the second form.


Here is a link to the man page:


	http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/vwright.1.html


It does this with some library calls, so if you need to access this 
information from a C or C++ program, you might be able to figure it out 
from the source code in ray/src/util/vwright.c


-Greg
